It's the least I can do
If you give me the chance🌙🪄

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
And I won't be leaving 'til I finish stealing
Every piece of your heart
I know your hearts been broken, but don't you give up
I'll be there, yeah I know it to fix you with love
It hurts me to think that you've ever cried
So put your hands up
'Cause it's a stand up🐣✨

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
From the moment I met you, everything changed
I knew I had to get you whatever the pain
I had to take you and make you mine
I would walk through the desert, I would walk down the aisle
I would swim all the oceans just to see you smile
Whatever it takes is fine😤✋

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Under the lights tonight, you turned around
And you stole my heart with just one look
It took a minute girl to steal my heart
When I saw your face, I fell in love tonight (eh, eh, eh, eh, eh) 
With just one look, yeah (eh, eh, eh, eh, eh)
❤️👀😩

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
My words fall and they hit the ground Oh, life
Come on here, don't you fail me now?
I start to say
"I think I love you", but I make no sound
You know, 'cause all my life
I've been waiting for a girl like you to come around 👉🏼👈🏼🪄

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: "I believe in the Book which Allah has sent down;  Allah is our Lord and your Lord: for us (is the responsibility for) our deeds, and for you for your deeds. There is no contention between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is (our) Final Goal. https://t.co/7JeZ6tmO5x

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
We bathe under the same 🌞
We sleep under the same 🌙
We are much closer than we think 😤

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
In my heart, no one compares to you
White is the colour of your heart
There is no one like you
Oh, how I loved your answer
I will always be by your side
Even if everyone is again you
I will always love you
I will always love you 
حضل أحبك Hadal Ahbek

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You speak to me of all that pains you.
As I wonder, here and now how to keep you by my side
Life will give you time to forget
The tears of recent days have jaded your eyes
Rest your head, on the pillow https://t.co/7yn2O4Sfls

Press that heart and find Apple 😉

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
I wanna built you a boat
One as strong as you are free
So anytime you think that your heart is gonna sink
You know it won't
I wanna built you a boat
Everything I need I get from you
Oooh, ooh
Giving back is all I wanna do
Oooh

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
I wanna write you a song
One as beautiful as you are sweet
Just a hint of pain for the feeling 
That I get when you are gone
I wanna write you a song

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
O life of the world, I long for a sight of your visage.
My heart is inflamed with the thought of your tall, beauteous stature.

Wherever Qutbuddin wander, he returns to you again and again.
Like a chain, your beauteous locks have ensnared his heart 😩💕

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: Free time is a curse for me

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
But you once told me "Don't give up You can do it day by day"
And diamonds, they don't turn to dust or fade away<<<333333333

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
What do you do when a chapter ends?
Do you close the book and never read it again?

Where do you go when your story's done?
You can be who you were or who you'll become

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
They don’t know what we do best
That’s between me and you, our little secret😉🌟

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You're like a sunshine, only givin' good vibes
Any, any time that you roll in
Pullin' me out, never lettin' me down
And I wanna make sure you know it🪄

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: And isn't it just so pretty to think? All along there was some invisible string, tying you to me 😩✨

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Time, mystical time
Cutting me open, then healing me fine🪄
Were there clues I didn't see?💌

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You taught me a secret language
I can't speak with anyone else
And you know damn well
For you I would ruin myself
A million little times

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
They show their truth one single time
But they lie, and they lie, and they lie
A million little times

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: External power can only be achieved by internal power!

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Education just gives Knowledge.
And, all knowledgable aren't wise~

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Oh, I tell them I'm the one
I'm the one you can't be without
You can tell your friends. I never let you down
I'ma let you erase every single doubt 
Tell your friends, tell your, tell your friends🥁
🎶

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Oh, you're the only one, only one I think about
Every time you go, want you to stay around
If you want to give 'em something to talk about
(Say it loud, tell 'em, say it loud)🥁
🎵

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Second, third, and hundredth chances
Balancin' on breaking branches

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You drew stars around my scars
But now I'm bleedin'
'Cause I knew you
Steppin' on the last train
Marked me like a bloodstain

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: a friend to all, is a friend of none

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
And, if my wishes came true
It would've been YOU
It would've been you In my defense, I have none For never leaving well enough alone 
But it would've been fun
If you would've been the ONE

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Feel with your kiss on me
Lips are made of ecstasy
I'll be yours for a thousand lives
I'm free as a bird when I'm flying in your cage (So lost)
I'm diving in deep and I'm riding with no brakes
And I'm bleeding your love when you're swimming in my veins
You've got me now

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You've got me now
Been waiting for a lifetime for you
Been breaking for a lifetime for you 
Wasn't looking for love till I found you Oh, yeah
For love, till I found you
#foryou #LiamPayne

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You know, that I don't need no money 
When your love is beside me 
You opened up my heart And then you threw away the key
Now it's just you and me (Hmph) 
And you don't care 'bout, where I've been

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
I was always gonna live fast, die young 
Slow down when you came along, yeah Burn bright, burn out
But now you make me wanna live forever All that runnin', gonna give it up for you
Nothing ever get me high like you do
Some way, somehow You and I, we're gonna live #forever

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
I learned how to love
'Cause you taught me how
I don't like who I used to be
But that don't matter now
'Cause they're in your head But I'm in your heart
#LiamPayne

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Wish I could press reset but it's not that easy
How can I forget someone Who gave me so much to remember?

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
When I feel like nothing's gonna hold me
down, you do
Used to be scared of fallin'
'Til you came around, came around
Now I just wanna stay here, fall into midnight
Want nobody else now, only you, feel right
And fall right into you💕

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: Maza is the by-product of MEHNAT!🤙
